answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found a variety of different programs and policies used by other municipalities to handle vacant property.
The City of Riverside has created the Infill Program to locate and then utilize vacant areas of the city.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3774/Infill_Strategy
The City of Broken Arrow has created a similar program. The document details their clean-up process, media relations, dispatcher instructions, and private and public property concerns.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/1606/Operation_Community_Pride
The City of Richmond, VA uses a Vacant Property Registry.
http://icma.org/en/Article/10127/City_Launches_Vacant_Property_Registry_to_Reduce_Neighborhood_Blight
A similar system exists in Fairfield and Claremont, CA.
Fairfield: http://www.fairfield.ca.gov/gov/depts/police/vacant_building_registration.asp
Claremont: http://www.ci.claremont.ca.us/ps.municipalservices.cfm?ID=2298
I have also included the Overview of Municipal Vacant Building Registries from Buffalo, NY.
http://www.ppgbuffalo.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/vacant+property+registry+laws.pdf
For more program ideas I have included two reports.
The first one is called; How Can Municipalities Confront the Vacant Property Challenge?  by the Chicago Metropolitan Agency for Planning, Business and Professional People for the Public Interest and the Metropolitan Mayors Caucus. 
http://www.bpichicago.org/documents/HowCanMunicipalitiesConfronttheVacantPropertyChallenge_AnIntroductoryGuide-1.pdf
The second report is a survey of best practices for vacant and abandoned properties done by the United States Conference of Mayors. It also includes a number of specific city examples and case studies.
http://usmayors.org/bestpractices/vacantproperties08.pdf
Alleghany County, PA also has a vacant property recovery program which you can view below.
http://www.pennhills.org/documents%5CVacantPropertyRecovery.pdf
Also, a recent Knowledge Network blog discusses additional programs for reusing vacant property.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/333/Reusing_Vacant_Property
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
